title: Short-Intensive Workshop for Improving English Teachers' Speaking Proficiency

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Project-based assessment for in-service practitioners in a smartphone-based learning environment

learning_goals: Enhance the ability to fluently articulate pronunciation, intonation, and expressions for over 5 minutes during English lessons through real-time feedback and modeling.
Acquire the ability to design and implement speaking activities tailored to learner levels through a 5-stage PBL project.
Collaborate with peer teachers to generate and apply over 30 context-specific classroom English expressions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
